function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Integration of voice assistant technology in cooking apps may lead to cross-contamination of devices in the kitchen.","category":"Business","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reduced focus on hygiene and social distancing measures due to increased reliance on digital experiences.","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Masks and sanitizers may affect ambient conditions","category":"Physical Environment","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increase of displayed covid-19 guidelines, warnings, and obligations in stores","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ambient conditions of physical servicescape, including background music and noise levels","category":"Business","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Health screening measures may be perceived as invading personal privacy","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of physical servicescape changes on customer experience cx due to pandemic challenges","category":"Business","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Closure of retail establishments leading to economic impact","category":"Business","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited resources of the government may impact the effectiveness of support for consumer loans in housing and automotive industry.","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Backlog in car production due to surge in demand after support for consumer loans.","category":"Business","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased cooperation between government and financial sector may lead to efficient management of economic crises.","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased marketing expenditures in banking and food service industries","category":"Business","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of fast and deliberate response to the crisis","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability to act quickly on learnings and develop innovative service products for food service businesses","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of decreased customer confidence in banking services","category":"Business","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Financial impact on restaurants and cafes if the campaign is not successful","category":"Business","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of proactive actions in crisis phase","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on reactive measures","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective learning from crisis experiences","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased demand for food and grocery delivery leading to higher exposure to contagious diseases","category":"Business","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased loans in ’other loans’ category indicate potential household debt accumulation","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid increase in loan stock may indicate excessive risk-taking by banks","category":"Business","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Sharp decline at the end of march followed by a rise in april and may","category":"Economy","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decrease in consumer confidence leading to reduced expenditures","category":"Economy","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decline in industrial production and retail sales","category":"Economy","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Encouraging face-to-face transactions in branch for certain transactions could increase the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Business","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Physical contact during cash transactions at atms","category":"Business","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Vulnerability of elderly population to disease transmission","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases in bank branches due to lack of social distancing and contact reduction measures.","category":"Business","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Decrease in demand for banking services due to decline in economic activity","category":"Business","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increase in non-performing loans and bankruptcies due to businesses closing and households losing income","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential resurgence of covid-19 due to relaxation of restrictions","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Concerns over reduced demand in the early stages of normalization","category":"Business","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Citizens under 20 likely to carry the virus without symptoms and infect others","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Concerns about psychological and emotional wellbeing of restricted individuals","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Emotional, psychological, sociological consequences and serious economic implications","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Restriction of public places and businesses","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Restriction of movement for elderly and high-risk individuals","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Imposition of curfew and fines for non-compliance","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 on deposit banking and food service industries","category":"Business","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Strategic uncertainty and severe financial distress for firms","category":"Business","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapid spread of covid-19 in the built environment","category":"Physical Environment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Economic downturn and recession due to covid-19 crisis","category":"Economy","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Declining trust in national currency and economic policy","category":"Economy","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of vaccination availability","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased risk of spreading contagious diseases through physical interaction in retail spaces.","category":"Business","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increasing use of face masks and sanitizers may lead to environmental pollution and waste management issues.","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unprecedented transmissibility and variety in symptoms of covid-19","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Economic uncertainty and vulnerability to a second wave of infections","category":"Economy","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Little prospect of widely available vaccine and second global outbreak","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"High"}]}
